entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the water early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
